segments.text: Do you know anything about Dr . Miller's classes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Are you in his class ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm thinking of taking his class next semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He really knew his stuff , but he graded hard . Would that be OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I really need someone who is really good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't find it overwhelming to earn a good grade if you work at it . Can you do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Man , this guy was so funny when he was teaching . I like that , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that stuff isn't important to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you know that he is a fairly new teacher and very current in his field ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't care about any of that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We all are looking for different things in an instructor . I hope I've helped you .
segments.speaker: S2
